# Copilot Instructions

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

## Project Overview
This is a Next.js project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Turbopack support.

## Tech Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js (App Router)
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Linting**: ESLint
- **Bundler**: Turbopack (for development)

## Project Structure
- `/src/app`: Application routes and pages
- `/public`: Static assets
- Import alias: `@/*` maps to `src/*`

## Best Practices
- Use TypeScript for all new files
- Follow Next.js App Router conventions
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Leverage Server Components by default
- Use Client Components only when needed (add 'use client' directive)
